conbody.p: remote controlA dedicated Remote Desktop window is also available for monitoring and control of individual workstations. This window presents at a glance both the remote screen and different remote control actions that are available for selected workstation.

Select Remote desktop in the student pop-up menu (see ) to call up the Remote Desktop window ( ) on your screen. The window contains a copy of the student's screen (11), list of logged in students (9), and following buttons:

row.entry: Input - take control of student's keyboard and mouse;
Fit - resize the window to fit remote screen;
Scribble - scribble notes on the screen (see section Live screen for further details);
Resize - resize remote screen to fit the window;
Screenshot - take a screenshot of remote computer and save a local copy;

Audio - audio control sub-menu:
Listen (see )
Conversation (see )
Record (see )

conbody.p: Press the Close button (10) at the bottom of the window to close it.
